channel.title: Making a bank pin code, but got 1 error, please help
channel.description:
so i have made this bank pin code... it has all worked, but 1 part...
how do you think i would fix this [code]client.java:11: illegal forward reference public int pin = (pin1*1000)+(pin2*100)+(pin3*10)+pin4; ^ client.java:11: illegal forward reference public int pin = (pin1*1000)+(pin2*100)+(pin3*10)+pin4; ^ client.java:11: illegal forward reference public int pin = (pin1*1000)+(pin2*100)+(pin3*10)+pin4; ^ client.java:11: illegal forward reference public int pin = (pin1*1000)+(pin2*100)+(pin3*10)+pin4; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
